structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 158, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 176, effective June 20, 2005. -- Impliedly amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, secs. 31 and 32. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4042-2.
